name: Freecell (Johannes Braun)
overview: This is a C64 version of the popular solitaire game of the same name that has become synonymous with Microsoft Windows since Windows '95. This is actually the second implementation of Freecell on the C64, with the first being released in 1997 as part of the popular US based LoadStar disk magazine. This version was developed by Johannes Braun and released as a freeware/public domain game in 2005.
